replies.body:
This. Everyone has said their own teams or the following: 
Avicadian heroes (upsides: goods pvp skill downsides: bad organization and tactics, being dicks to other teams (some members only))
Apex (upsides: nice people, decent organization and skill 
downsides:eZ nubs, jkjk, but leaves some to be desired in terms of pvp skill, great for just for funz
immunity (Upsides: good organization, good players, Downsides: eZ nub roboticboy, hakkniv is biased)

replies.body:
"Listen the top three clans may be Immunity, Apex, and Avicadian Heros buuuutt. One time when we scrimmed Immunity we won one out of three games! (May be just one BUT WE BEAT IMMUNITY!!!!) We beat Apex 2 out of 6 which really surprised me... D00ZiE even said that we impressed him. You may now clap while we bow."


-Fancy Soldiers

replies.body: I really think that no one is the Best, I think that everyone has a chance of winning, because it is mainly teamwork, some of it is PvP, I admit but then most of it is Teamwork. Get this idea of being the "Best" out of your mind because that is not what makes us, it is friendship and teamwork that defines us! Alright, do you get the idea! I understand that many people will flame and rage at this comment but I don't care. I am saying what is logic!
replies.body_tagged: I really think that no one is the Best, I think that everyone has a chance of winning, because it is mainly teamwork, some of it is PvP, I admit but then most of it is Teamwork. I understand that many people will flame and rage at this comment but I don't care. I am saying what is logic!

I scrimmed against you guys multiple times while in Immunity, we wrecked you, Immunity are a very honest team and none of them would ever twist the truth, especially Robo and Hak, they are great guys. It's completely pointless to actually lie to people over a scrim, they mean next to nothing.

Get this idea of being the "Best" out of your mind because that is not what makes us, it is friendship and teamwork that defines us! Alright, do you get the idea! replies.body: I'm in Avicadian Heroes, i'm just a random because I never play avic.us. Let's not lie tho, we suck as a team. The only thing that carries us through is YLO, killers bow spam and our skill as individuals.

reply_to.body: Someone rename this thread "Insult avicadian heroes work as a team". I mean come on. Most of the people posting on this topic are OCN regulars who have had a lot of experience with tournaments. Most of us avicus players haven't played in many tournament's if any. Cut Avicadian Heroes etc some slack please.
